I don't know you Tri....... But I'll always remember you owe me 300plat for
that damn weap!!!

> From: whirlnuc <whirlnuc@...>
>

>

> time i come back :)
>
> P.S Fesse, i still own u 300pp . Will pay u back when i come back so

>
